en.title: About LineHayat
en.text:
Who we are


LineHayat is a careline run by students for students. We are the first nightline service for a Malaysian University, designated for students of Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM). We aim to provide peer-to-peer support for the twists and turns during university life. We know, our fellow friends will feel more comfortable communicating with their peers.

What we do


We help you to clear your thoughts by lending you a listening ear for whatever you may be facing right now.

You may want to talk about:


  • Stress
  • Disappointments
  • Previous problems or happenings
  • Or just wanting someone to chat with
  • Anything else!

Feel free to call us or reach us on our live chat.


#You Share, We Care


What to Expect


You are ensured that:
  • We don’t judge.
  • You direct the conversation.
  • Everything is confidential and anonymous.
